mapper.insert:
insert into kt_runner (task_id, `trigger`, status, create_by, start_time, end_time) values (#{taskId}, #{trigger}, #{status}, #{createBy}, #{startTime}, #{endTime})
select last_insert_id()
mapper.update:
update kt_runner
task_id = #{taskId},
`trigger` = #{trigger},
status = #{status},
start_time = #{startTime},
end_time = #{endTime},
create_by = #{createBy},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select r.*, t.project_id, t.name as task_name, fr.file_type as repo_type, fr.file_name as repo_name, p.`key` as project_key, p.name as project_name from kt_runner r join kt_task t on r.task_id = t.id join kt_file_repo fr on fr.id = t.repo_id join kt_project p on t.project_id=p.id where t.is_deleted = 0 and fr.is_deleted = 0 and r.id = #{id}
